name: @sap/btp-feature-toggles
description: The SAP BTP feature toggle library will enable JavaScript applications using the SAP Cloud Application Programming Model to maintain live-updatable feature toggles via Redis.

scripts.lint: npm run eslint && npm run prettier
scripts.lint:ci: npm run eslint:ci && npm run prettier:ci
scripts.docs: cd docs && bundle exec jekyll serve
scripts.docs:install: cd docs && npx shx rm -rf vendor Gemfile.lock && bundle install
scripts.upgrade-lock: npx shx rm -rf package-lock.json node_modules && npm i --package-lock

author: Richard Lindner <richard.lindner@sap.com>
